summary: Added auto-retry logic for photo upload on network errors with UI feedback
next_steps: Add CSS styles for .retrying status class if not already present
Write unit tests for retry logic

changes.description: Extended UploadProgress interface with 'retrying' status and retryAttempt field
Added isNetworkError() helper to detect Axios and generic network errors
Added delay() helper for async waiting between retries
Implemented retry loop in handleUpload with max 3 attempts on network errors
Added UI rendering for 'retrying' status showing attempt counter and progress bar

behavior.on_network_error: Wait 1.5s, then retry with 'retrying' status showing attempt number
behavior.on_all_retries_failed: Show error 'Network error. Try again later.' in Russian
